description: Suou Pavlichenko is a 13 year old girl who lives in Vladivostok, Russia. In the Gemini of the Meteor story arc, Suou becomes involved in the war and machinations between the various groups and Contractors, and her life is forever changed when she meets http://anidb.net/ch7571 [Hei]. She is Eurasian, with a Japanese mother and Russian father. She also has a twin brother, http://anidb.net/ch12052 [Shion], who uses a wheelchair.
name: Suou Pavlichenko
